name: dist
description: Files for creating a Shell distributable binary

scripts.postinstall: if [ `uname` == Darwin ]; then brew list | grep '^mono$'; if [ $? == 1 ]; then brew install mono; fi; brew list | grep '^dpkg$'; if [ $? == 1 ]; then brew install dpkg; fi; brew list | grep '^fakeroot$'; if [ $? == 0 ]; then brew install fakeroot; fi; fi
